chapters.title: Introduction to ETFs
chapters.summary: An overview of what Exchange Traded Funds (ETFs) are, their benefits, and how they differ from other investment instruments.

chapters.title: Diversification Strategies
chapters.summary: Explore how ETFs can be used to diversify your investment portfolio across various asset classes and sectors.

chapters.title: Active vs Passive Investing
chapters.summary: Discuss the differences between active and passive investing strategies in the context of ETFs, and how to choose the right approach for your goals.

chapters.title: Cost-Effective Investing with ETFs
chapters.summary: Learn about the cost advantages of ETFs, including lower expense ratios and trading fees, and how to maximize these benefits.
